StuffTheSpire:TheShadows.NAME: The Shadows
DESCRIPTIONS: Suddenly you hear a voice whispering to you. NL "Real Power comes over time and not in one Burst. NL Do you agree?"
You will agree with me at some point!

StuffTheSpire:NeowistPriest.NAME: Neowtonian Priest
DESCRIPTIONS: Ascending the Spire, you find yourself in a building made of black marble. NL A hooded priest of the Neowtonian cult emerges from the dark and starts speaking: "We have been waiting for your arrival. Shall we begin the offering?"
"Our almighty goddess is pleased for now. Your blood is now flowing in her veins.".
"Our almighty goddess is pleased by your generous donation." NL You notice the priest heading to a nearby tavern.
A purple bonfire starts spreading inside of you. You scream and shout in agony until the flames extinguish. But the pain won't stop.

StuffTheSpire:FlowerFields.NAME: Rose in the Fields
DESCRIPTIONS: You arrive at a large patch of grass which has been conserved surprisingly well, despite the spireblight. In the middle of the field you spot something that sparks your interest: A wild #yRose, potentially the last of it's kind. You feel tempted to bring it with you.
Digging up the precious plant, you prick your finger on one of it's thorns, but eventually manage to pull out the entire rose and put it in a makeshift flower pot.
You give in to your romantic reflexes and rip the flower out of the ground, dooming an entire species. You monster.

Listening to the screeching byrds in the distance, smelling the fresh air and getting warmed by the small beams of sunlight coming through a window above, you decide it's not worth the hassle and take a nap instead.
